p: As it usually happens, the serious crisis we fell into has to be taken as a real chance for all of us to rethink our own lives, thus turning into moral, social and scientific rebirth for the entire hard-hearted world of today. Specifically, for people living with diabetes, the COVID-19 pandemic is even more complicating life. Our role is to do all our best to relieve those people, as much as possible, and, if they happen to be hospitalized, to guarantee them the best therapeutic options, which can be quite different from those to be used in people without diabetes.
